xuiDraggable
directive in module xui

Description

XUI component for HTML 5 drag. Will autoscroll window during drag.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY xui-draggable
     xui-draggable-object="{object}"
     [on-drag-start="{function(event) }"]
     [on-drag-end="{function(event) }"]
     [adorner-drag-class="{boolean}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
xuiDraggableObjectobject

An object that will be in the drag payload. Must be serializable.

onDragStart
(optional)
function(event)

Event called when drag is initiated.

onDragEnd
(optional)
function(event)

Event called when dragging ends (either drop or cancel).

adorner-drag-class
(optional)
boolean

Class to attach to dragged copy.
